doc: Describes how the border of a UI element should be rendered.

members.doc: Looks as if the content is sunken into the canvas
members.name: inset

members.doc: Looks as if the content is coming out of the canvas
members.name: outset

members.doc: Two parallel lines with some space between them
members.name: double

members.doc: Looks as if it were carved in the canvas
members.name: groove

members.doc: Looks as if it were coming out of the canvas
members.name: ridge

name: BorderStyle
